module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: Free and quick setupAccess credit cards and 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationConnect with 50+ million Skrill account holdersHighest security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktop

module.name: paypal
module.description: As the leading online payment company, PayPal offers a range of simple, fast and secure solutions trusted by more than 250M users
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: As the leading online payment company, PayPal offers a range of simple, fast and secure solutions trusted by more than 250M users. With this free official module, benefit from our advanced commerce platform and grow your business online, on mobile and internationally.
module.additional_description: Easy to activate: With PayPal you can start accepting payments almost instantly without any set-up fee! Increase your conversion rate up to 88.7%* thanks to our mobile optimised solutions, without the need for any additional integration. And with One Touch™, your buyers can pay for their purchases faster than ever! Seller Protection: Protect your incomes against online fraud thanks to our Seller Protection. We cover tangible and intangible goods as well as most services.  A crystal clear fee policy and no surprises. No hidden fees. A commission fee applies only when you receive a payment. And the more transactions you receive the less it costs you.  *Conversion rate measured by Comscore online panel, Q4 2017. Analysed shopping behaviour at 20 large merchant sites across categories, utilising its panel of 1 million US consumers.

module.name: cashondelivery
module.description: Accept cash on delivery payments
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept cash on delivery payments

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Because your business is precious, it needs to be protected, it will help you make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Because your business is precious, it needs to be protected, it will help you make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Protect your store: stay up-to-date on security to prevent your activity from bad intentions.Offer scoring possibilities: get a scoring for each order to evaluate how risky it can be.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method. By running the most recent version of PrestaShop, you will benefit from the latest features and improvements available. For this reason (and for your shop security) it is always recommended to use an up-to-date version.
module.additional_description: The easiest way to upgrade your PrestaShop store!

module.name: gamification
module.description: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep up with your store: benefit from PrestaShop’s wide range of features and learn to use them all.Explore all possibilities: with the click of a button, be able to see sales-enhancing features you might be missing out on.

module.name: gsitemap
module.description: Generate your Google sitemap file. This module helps you build a sitemap for your shop, and keep it up to date
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Generate your Google sitemap file. This module helps you build a sitemap for your shop, and keep it up to date.
module.additional_description: Optimize natural search (SEO) on all search engines (Google, Bing, Yahoo...) with this module that will facilitate indexation of your pages and products by search engines

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer.
module.additional_description: Are you looking for new clients online? Prestashop has partnered with Google to help you find them. With Google Ads, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers.

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell more!
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell more!
module.additional_description: Synchronize your PrestaShop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautifully designed emails, and automatically follow up with customers who abandon their cart with a personalized message -- all from a single platform. With the Sendinblue module, you can:Keep better track of your customer relationships by automatically synchronizing your contacts with Sendinblue.Be there for your customers while they browse your website by automatically installing live chat.Increase your sales with Sendinblue's abandoned cart functionality -- set it up in minutes!Wow your subscribers and keep them coming back with beautiful newsletters and marketing emails.Sell more with retargeting to bring visitors back to your store in order to complete their purchase.Make sure your most important emails (subscription & order confirmations, password resets, etc.) make it to the inbox with a platform designed for deliverability.Get support when you need it from a team who cares! Available by phone or email. See the tutorial: https://help.sendinblue.com/hc/en-us/articles/115001123645-PrestaShop-1-7-Set-up-the-plugin

module.description_full: Accept payments by bank transfer.

module.additional_description: Use this native module to delete databases in one click: it helps clean your store and its data by allowing you the suppression of all data.

module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Create a showcase: display your store’s best selling items directly on your front office and boost your sales.Create a separate page in addition to the block: your visitors will have a clear idea of your most purchased products.

module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: graphnvd3
module.description: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3.org/) is JavaScript library that was built specifically to generate beautiful charts using D3.js (http://d3js.org/), a JavaScript library built to manipulate documents based on data.

module.description_full: Enables you to enter the intra-community VAT number when creating the address. You must fill in the company field to allow entering the VAT number.

module.name: cronjobs
module.description: Make the development of your activity your main goal, don’t lose time working on minor tasks: automate it!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make the development of your activity your main goal, don’t lose time working on minor tasks: automate it!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Save time: turn simple jobs into programmed tasks you won’t have to care about too much.Schedule your needs: and make it automatically done, easy-peasy!Handle all these tasks: have it all listed at the same place to better manage each job and create new ones if needed.

module.name: onboarding
module.description: The OnBoarding module greets first-time users to their PrestaShop back office: through a small playful interface, it shows the user how to launch his/her shop in several easy steps
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The OnBoarding module greets first-time users to their PrestaShop back office: through a small playful interface, it shows the user how to launch his/her shop in several easy steps.

module.name: emarketing
module.description: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping. Easy campaign creation, price-comparison and competitor-check included. Free of charge.
module.additional_description: Use the PrestaShop Ads software to create Google Shopping campaigns in no time and without any AdWords knowledge. Our system optimizes your campaigns continuously and fully automated for maximum performance. The PrestaShop Ads module generates the product data feed required for Google Shopping as well as it installs the Conversion Tracking automatically.                                                            You haven’t advertised on Google yet? No problem at all, the PrestaShop Ads module can create an AdWords account and Merchant Center on your behalf. Powerful tools assist you in focusing your ad budget on your most promising products: Use our automated price comparison to find out if competitors offer your products at a cheaper price. PrestaShop Ads  - powered by emarketing is a Google Premium Partner and Google’s Overall Champion EU 2015

module.name: advancedeucompliance
module.description: This module helps European merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module helps European merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws.

module.name: 1and1ionoshosting
module.description: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA.  Please click here to benefit from the UK special offer and here if you are based in Canada
module.additional_description: Further advantages you can benefit from with 1&1 New Hosting:Choose from 40 Click & Build Apps including PrestaShop1&1 Expert App Support available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week – with advice and practical help specific to the application you’re usingMaximum availability thanks to the geo-redundant hosting of your website in two geographically separate data centres1&1 SiteLock included, keeping your website virus-freeGuaranteed performance from 2 GB RAM (with the 1&1 Unlimited Plus package) Domain included free with select packages (.co.uk, .com, .net, .org, .me.uk or .org.uk)Unlimited power: Unlimited webspace, traffic, and MySQL databases

module.name: cartsguru
module.displayName: Carts Guru | Abandoned Cart Solution | Free Trial
module.description: Turn Your Abandoned Carts Into Sales Carts Guru is the all-in-one multichannel retargeting solution. Recover abandoned carts and convert them into sales
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Turn Your Abandoned Carts Into Sales Carts Guru is the all-in-one multichannel retargeting solution. Recover abandoned carts and convert them into sales.
module.additional_description: Multi-channel retargetingLeverage the power of Emails, Text Messages, and Messenger to run effective retargeting campaigns and recover up to 20% of your lost carts.Tailored campaignsAdvanced segmentation and unlimited user journey scenarios to re-engage your visitors and encourage them to complete their purchases.Features you’ll loveCoupon code management, multi-website management, widgets opt-ins, advanced dashboard & metrics, prompt customer support. Developed in-house, the technology combines all the tools you need to win back up to 20% of your lost carts. Try it now with our free 10-day trial! Check out our website: https://carts.guru/en/prestashop

module.name: worldfirst
module.description: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessInternational payments and foreign exchange solutions for businesses and online marketplace sellers
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessInternational payments and foreign exchange solutions for businesses and online marketplace sellers.
module.additional_description: WorldFirst help you make international money transfers quickly, securely and at fantastic exchange rates, which could save you money compared to your bank or online marketplace. So if you need to pay overseas suppliers or repatriate earnings from international marketplaces like Amazon, Newegg or Cdiscount, WorldFirst can help. Click the button in the panel to register your interest with WorldFirst and a member of their team will be in touch to discuss opening an account. Please note this service is available in English, French, Dutch, Chinese and Japanese.

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store&rsq
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store’s back office! This free module allows you to easily modify the template of your transactional emails, such as the registration confirmation or order confirmation, without hiring a designer.
module.additional_description: This email template installation and management module allows you to interchange and modify your different templates and save your configurations. Depending on the design and level of customization that the developer has allowed, your templates can be customized and allow you to:   modify the emails’ main and secondary colorschoose the text's fontadd links to your social networks and modify their logosinsert images and additional text This tool also allows you to save your transactional emails and the default PrestaShop design. Finally, you don't have to write or translate your emails’ content: the template automatically retrieves the default translations available for the transactional email in PrestaShop!

module.name: adroll
module.description: Integrate your PrestaShop store with AdRoll to start attracting new visitors to your online store, bringing back and converting site visitors and driving more revenue with existing customers
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Integrate your PrestaShop store with AdRoll to start attracting new visitors to your online store, bringing back and converting site visitors and driving more revenue with existing customers.
module.additional_description: On average, only 96-98% of e-commerce store visitors leave before completing a purchase. AdRoll retargeting helps you reach those lost visitors personalized product recommendation ads across devices on the Web, Email, Facebook and Instagram. Our PrestaShop customers average a 7x ROI when using AdRoll: For every $10 spent, they see $70 in attributable revenue to AdRoll! This PrestaShop module streamlines the onboarding experience with AdRoll so you can start driving more sales faster! In just a few clicks, your store will be set up with the AdRoll pixel, essential audience segments, ROI/revenue tracking, and your synchronized product catalog for dynamic product recommendation ads. Other benefits:Use AdRoll to attract new visitors and retarget existing visitors across the web, mobile and Facebook.Make more sales and solve shopping cart abandonment like our 25,000+ customers.No minimums.Customer Support via Email, Chat & Phone.We'll even give you free ads!

module.name: cleverreach
module.description: Spotify, Bugatti & DHL send their newsletters with CleverReach. Why? Because its that simple. Benefit from our extensive software & flexible pricing without contract duration
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Spotify, Bugatti & DHL send their newsletters with CleverReach. Why? Because its that simple. Benefit from our extensive software & flexible pricing without contract duration.
module.additional_description: The module directly connects our CleverReach Email Marketing tool with your PrestaShop. All your important PrestaShop data will instantly and automatically be updated and completed in the CleverReach newsletter tool. The synchronization saves you time and trouble. At the same time, you avoid errors that often occur during a manual import and export.Synchronized PrestaShop data:Newsletter subscriptions and unsubscribesFirst and last name, interests, gender, age, birthday, address details purchased items, revenue, frequency of purchases, average shopping cart, order number, item number, product name, price, currency, quantity, amountproduct details of your PrestaShop products like image, text, price, size, material Its as simple as that!Use valuable data to create personal offers your customers really want. Your benefits: more opens, more clicks and more conversions!This is the key to increasing sales: your customers buy more and more frequently Profit. Profit. Profit.Click on the top right Download -button now to download the module and install it in the PrestaShop backend without any great effort.Afterwards, quickly and easily connect your PrestaShop with CleverReach, synchronize your shop data and create and send your first email.CleverReach is the provider for email marketing for more than 190,000 customers, e.g. Spotify, Levis, Playboy, DHL and Amnesty International, in 152 countries. CleverReach was founded in 2007 in Germany and complies with the highest standards of data protection.Exclusively for PrestaShop customers:Get a 10% discount off your CleverReach rate for 12 months! Email marketing made easier: discount will automatically provided when creating a new account.

module.name: mailchimppro
module.description: Mailchimp is an always-on marketing platform for small businesses. We make innovative, beautiful products that empower you to grow the way you want to
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mailchimp is an always-on marketing platform for small businesses. We make innovative, beautiful products that empower you to grow the way you want to. Create unique campaigns, automate your busy work, get smarter as you go.
module.additional_description: See detailed campaign reportsfrom engagement to ROIso you can sell more stuff.Sync and segment your list, then send targeted campaigns based on things like products purchased and amount spent over time.Create abandoned cart emails, send product recommendations, and more.Follow up with, delight, and re-engage your customers using pre-built customer lifecycle automations.Design and send personalized transactional messageslike shipping notifications, invoices, and moredirectly through Mailchimp.

module.name: ns8csp
module.description: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance. Reduce your store’s chargebacks, increase the effectiveness of your ad campaigns, and ensure quality of your site’s user experience.
module.additional_description: NS8 Protect uses industry-leading techniques in behavioral analytics, real-time user scoring, and global monitoring to identify bots and other malicious activity in your storefront. As a platform-based approach to online threat reduction, NS8 Protect is designed to help your store fight the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance.  Revenue Killer #1: Order FraudNS8 Protect scores every visitor to your storefront. Every action taken by the visitor leading up to and including placing an order is scored individually and reflected in the EQ8 Score. Low-scoring orders are most likely fraudulent and may be held or flagged for manual review. NS8 Protect also provides automated tools to escalate suspect orders or even request e-mail and SMS text verification from the visitor. The mix of automated tools and easier manual reviews empowers merchants to optimize their order processing and minimize risk.  Benefit from the network of stores and websites already tagging fraudulent users and suspicious behavior by using NS8 software.Reduce costly chargebacks and the risk they pose to your merchant account.Reduce both the labor dedicated to manual review and shipping lead times.Set your own custom threshold for suspect orders and users. Revenue Killer #2: Advertising Fraud Advertising fraud (especially remarketing fraud) is a huge and growing issue for online merchants. NS8 Protect not only scores all traffic visiting your store, but it also detects and records the traffic’s source. You will see when, and which, advertising sources are delivering low-quality, high-risk, fraudulent traffic. You will be able to save money and increase revenue by eliminating poorly performing campaigns and focusing your budget on the successful campaigns that deliver results.                       Compare scored campaigns for the presence of bot traffic and fraud.Prevent bots and fraudulent users from being tagged for remarketing.Integrate with Google Analytics to tag high-value users for more effective remarketing.Track your store’s advertising savings from blocked fraudulent users. Revenue Killer #3: Poor Performance NS8 Protect includes 5 critical monitors that every PrestaShop store should have. If and when an issue arises, escalating text messages are sent to you and your staff warning of potential or actual problems. Monitor your store’s technical performance. If your store becomes slow or unresponsive due to plugin conflicts or other changes, you will be immediately notified.Monitor your store’s global performance relative to other eCommerce stores.Monitor your store’s encryption certificates. If your store’s certificate expires, users will be warned against using your service. NS8 will alert you first, before the all-important certificate expires.Monitor spam and malware blacklists for your store’s domain. If your store finds itself listed, maliciously or accidentally, NS8 Protect will alert you and direct you towards a solution.

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way.
module.additional_description: Once connected to your PrestaShop Addons account with this module, you:will benefit each week from an e-commerce tip, that is a tip to follow related to the e-commerce calendar, which you will find directly on your dashboard (ex: when and how to prepare for Black Friday, back to school promotions, etc.)protect your store by staying up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addonstake advantage of new features added to modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons

module.name: cleverppc
module.displayName: Ads on Google (Google Shopping + Dynamic Remarketing)
module.description: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network.If your account is suitable, we will apply a $75 coupon for your first campaigns!
module.additional_description: What do we do for you:Google Shopping campaigns: We create, manage and optimize your Google Shopping campaigns.Search campaigns: Be seen by customers as they search on Google.Display campaigns: Display Banners & Text Ads to reach people interested in your products.Remarketing and Dynamic Remarketing campaigns: Follow your own visitors through the internet offering your products once they leave your site. Benefits for your store:Maximize your marketing budget: Clever Google Ads app adjust bids with algorithms to ensure the best results.Attract the right customers to your store: We take the customers to your store in the very moment they are looking for your products on Google.Increase your ROI: Start getting potential customers at the lowest CPC and maximize your ROI!Get qualified traffic: Stop wasting money on useless clicks and start getting relevant traffic.Campaigns automatization: Our algorithm will learn the best way to help optimizing your campaigns through our technology of machine learning.

module.name: touchize
module.description: Swipe-2-Buy makes mobile shopping faster, easier and more enjoyable giving increasing loyalty and boosting mobile sales. Easy one-click installation and 3 months free trial
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Swipe-2-Buy makes mobile shopping faster, easier and more enjoyable giving increasing loyalty and boosting mobile sales. Easy one-click installation and 3 months free trial.
module.additional_description: A unique mobile shopping experience for your customersBy optimizing mobile sales with Swipe-2-Buy for smartphones and tablets, Touchize Commerce gives your customers a unique mobile shopping experienceLowers the barrier between inspiration and purchaseSwipe-2-Buy increases customer satisfaction and loyalty to your shopA unique tool to grow your online mobile salesConsumers gets a faster, simpler and more enjoyable shopping experience.Makes it simpler for the mobile consumers to put more products in the shopping cart (Increased Average Order Value /AOV)You can quickly add interactive promotional banners where consumers can drag products from the banners directly to the cart3-months free trial periodSign-up for a 3 months free trial and see all Touchize Swipe-2-Buy have to offerNo credit card requiredPricing info: https://touchize.com/subscription/prestashop
